website_summaries.verdict: A truly natural peanut butter at a fair price.
pros: Healthier than some other peanut butter options
cons: Because this is a natural peanut butter, you will have to  mix it up from time to time to keep the oils from settling on the top

customer_reviews.title: Great taste Great texture
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, Great texture my wife Loves this peanut butter. Because it is 100% peanut you must stirr it before using. We use a hand held electrical mixer but only connect one of the two beata arm mixing it rite in the same jar. So just hold the jar in one hand and the hand mixer in the other. 30 to 40 seconds your done stirring.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: no added sugar means it doesn't taste quite like regular peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: The cons: no added sugar means it doesn't taste quite like regular peanut butter, and it has a bit of a runny consistency. The pros: no added sugar means it's great for a low carb diet and if you're cutting sugar out of your diet your taste buds will have adjusted and the lack of sugar won't be that big of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Collier

customer_reviews.title: The best-tasting of any natural peanut butters
customer_reviews.text: I do not want any additives in my peanut butter, even if it is cane sugar. I have tried many all-naturals: cheaper, more expensive, "gourmet" and store brands. This is the best. It tastes amazingly yummy, is nice and creamy, and is easy to stir. Makes great peanut butter cookies and is terrific on apple slices, too. It is my final choice. I truly love it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: WATER WORLD PEANUT BUTTER
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter is way too watery, and therefore, is not thick enough. What have they done to it????? Very strange. I'm used to the all natural peanut butter where the oil is on top, so you can easily take it out. MOREOVER, THIS PEANUT BUTTER DOES NOT SEEM NATURAL AND IS NOT SO HEALTHY AS THE OIL IN IT IS HOMOGENEOUS. THIS MEANS YOU CAN'T SEPARATE THE FATTY OIL FROM THE PEANUTS.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: If you can't have salt in your diet but you love peanut butter, then Crazy Richards peanut butter is the answer for you.
customer_reviews.text: If you can't have salt in your diet but you love peanut butter, then Crazy Richards peanut butter is the answer for you. I read the other reviews and one person said how she first stirred up the peanut butter then placed it in the refridgerator upside down...great suggestion as it works great. This peanut butter is easy to spread after being in refridgerator over night. It is not runny nor hard but very spreadable. This peanut butter tastes great without salt and I am so glad I have found Crazy Richard's peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: No additives, spreadable and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect creamy peanut butter that is only made with peanuts. No sugar, no strange sounding additives. It is just peanut butter made from peanuts, it spreads easily and it tastes great. I would definitely buy this product again. If you're used to eating the major store bought brands then you will notice the lack of sugar, but it's also 100% better for you and if paired with honey or jam, it will still give you the sweetness you might crave.
customer_reviews.author: BookHigh

customer_reviews.title: ONE INGREDIENT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best natural peanut butter! There is only ONE ingredient...Peanuts. I searched so many “natural” brands and they all had some other ingredient in them. Not this one. If your are looking for truly natural peanut butter, this is the ONE! As noted on all natural brands, the oils from the peanuts tend to move to the surface. I have found that if you store the jar upside down it makes it easier to incorporate the oil back into the butter when mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product. There are many natural peanut butters on the market that have a better taste and consistency. Sorry but would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: faye a. hartman

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised, and I'm very happy that I bought a whole case. I tried it based on the reviews and sure enough, this is great tasting peanut butter. What can I say, I love peanut butter, been eating it since I was a kid, and it's great knowing that there's nothing extra in this brand. I just became a regular customer.
customer_reviews.author: Omnipotent Perpetual

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked
customer_reviews.text: This is really great tasting peanut butter. I originally got it for my dogs since the other brands are so full of sugar and who knows what else. I wasn't expecting it to be as good as it is for me to eat. I tried some, now I'm hooked and won't buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good, healthy peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I was actually impressed with this peanut butter. After reading some of the reviews, I wasn’t sure what to expect. I ordered a 3-pack and it arrived on time with no damage. I’ve only opened one jar, but it had no oil separation, so I didn’t even need to stir it. It was a bit drippy from the warm temperatures outside. I placed it in the fridge and by the next day the texture was firm and creamy. I’m trying to cut back on my sugar intake so this product fits my healthier choices list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good creamy peanut butter if you want to consume peanuts ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good creamy peanut butter if you want to consume peanuts in paste form. The taste is definitely different from those brands with added sweeteners. Great for dieting to measure and control your nutrition intake.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Y.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the taste of this peanut butter and the fact that it's natural. The only issue I have with it is that it is so thin if it is not refrigerated. Other than that I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The way peanut butter was intended
customer_reviews.text: My local grocery store usually rotates a bunch of different products and sometimes they have what you need and other times they dont. In my case, they almost never have good peanut butter. Just added sugar, hydrogenated oil, added salt, synthetic tasting, nasty stuff. I am now officially a fan of Crazy Richard. 100% peanuts, no salt, no sugar, just peanut butter in all of its seperation of oily goodness. If you need it to be a bit more dense/firm instead of creamy/liquidy, just put it in the fridge. I will be reordering soon as I got this last week and already finished one container.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi48

customer_reviews.title: More than "Just Peanuts"
customer_reviews.text: Look at the other reviews, they note the same thing about the horribly runny consistency of this peanut butter. Of all the peanut butters I've tried that are just peanuts, this is the ONLY one that is horribly runny. I'm guessing they've taken expense shortcuts and added straight peanut oil to save money. So....expect more fat than a true 'just peanuts' product. I tried the whole refrigerator thing, and after two jars I'm done with this. Will attempt to send it back, but I'll just toss it in the garbage if I'm unsuccessful.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It has one Ingredient.. PEANUTS!
customer_reviews.text: The best natural peanut butter on Amazon. It has one Ingredient.. PEANUTS!
customer_reviews.author: Vaporjoes LLC

customer_reviews.title: Thin.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was just this batch or what but it was extremely thin. Even after mixing thoroughly for a minute or so, while being sure to bring up anything solid that may have settled to the bottom, you can literally pour it out of the jar. It's even thinner than the peanut butter topping you can buy for ice cream. Luckily, I'm not spreading this on bread as it'd probably soak into it. I use it in my banana smoothies so at least I can use it up. The taste is a little more bitter than what I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: lonewolfz28

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Peanut Butter, Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Teddys peanut butter for the past few years and like it very much. However, Amazon was out of Teddys, so I decided to try Crazy Richard's peanut butter. It's really delicious and for a 12 jar (16 ounce jars) order was about 50% less than Teddys. Most peanut butter is loaded with added sugar and contains partially hydrogenated oils which are not healthy. Crazy Richard's contains no hydrogenated oils, added sugars, or preservatives. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JimmyBlues

customer_reviews.title: peanut butter or running oil ?
customer_reviews.text: So always trying new brands of nut butter. Got two jars of this as it came in one packet. Kind of regretting that now. First jar was just liquid. I stir it multiple times and sill is a running unflavourful mess. So I will definitely not be purchasing this again. What to do with it now ???
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Used as dog treat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a training tool for our dog. It's great that it is pure peanut butter without all the extra ingredients. She has stomach issues and frequent diarrhea, but this has not upset her stomach at all and she loves having it as a treat. To help with the gooeyness we put it in a tube in the fridge and squirt out as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Even when mixed and refrigerated it POURS!
customer_reviews.text: Despite mixing and refrigerating as directed on the jar, this peanut butter is more like a sauce. It does not hold together. You can pour it. I bought a whole case (at the beginning of the covid lockdown), and every jar is the same. Nice taste, but a total drippy mess as a sandwich spread.
customer_reviews.author: newleaf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good Peanut Butter!
customer_reviews.text: I found this peanut butter to be a littler runnier than I had hoped & the oil does tend to sit on top. It works well to store in the refrigerator and stir before using. It is certainly not like the peanut butter your taste buds are used to, which is to be expected when the only product is peanuts, but is still quite tasty and works well for my Keto diet. I tend to use peanut butter mostly in recipes these days and I have found others that I prefer for that, but this is certainly a useful go-to when just wanting a spoonful when I'm on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Geoppo

customer_reviews.title: Way too runny
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter is awful. I gave it one star for the taste, which was palatable. First, it is SO HARD to mix. Not only is it incredibly difficult, but it is nearly impossible to mix it without oil spilling over the sides Second, once you do get it mixed, it is still so runny that you cannot get it out of the container without it dripping off your utensil. What that means is YOU MUST REFRIGERATE IT, then wait overnight for it to set. Then you can eat this bland peanut butter. I don't have this problem with freshly ground peanuts or Adam's, or any other manufacturer of single ingredient peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So HARD
customer_reviews.text: I got a pack of these and all of them were impossible to stir. Hard peanut butter tells me that it’s not fresh. I eat a lot of different kinds of nut butters and I like to try different brands but I’m sorry to say I probably wouldn’t get this again. The plastic container, the hard peanut butter that wouldn’t fully mix & the plastic it was in was pretty flimsy. I’m not sure if I got an old batch but jeez it was difficult and not worth it ha.
customer_reviews.author: Laurice Kessler

customer_reviews.title: JUST AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: BIG LUMP IN THE JAR STUCK TOGETHER HAD TO HAND MIXER IT TO MIX IT. WORST PEANUT BUTTER IN ALL MY 76 YEARS------TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: pas

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Peanut Butter...A+++
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the brand Teddie peanut butter for a long time now. They were out of stock recently and I thought I'd try this Crazy Richards. I am not disappointed at all. It taste great and comes out of the refrigerator perfect to spread. A+++
customer_reviews.author: 13puppies

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but nuts
customer_reviews.text: Great peanut butter for the purists out there. The roast is great and fills the nose with depth. The lack of salt and sugar is quite welcome and seems to allow the appreciation of the nutty flavor. Been my favorite apple dipper for some time. You should be prepared for a forearm workout when u open a jar and prep it for eating. Remove pb from jar to big bowl, work out all lumps and get consistent mix. U can leave a few lumps, they will smooth out in time. Store in fridge after that to eliminate separation. Worth the effort to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter was a waste of money. Super runny, so much so that even when you mix it in order to blend it’s just even that makes it more liquid and greasy gross. No flavor, just a mess. I guess I’ll save it for the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana V Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Runny, Runny, Runny but taste is decent
customer_reviews.text: Update: I refrigerated the jar which changes the consistency to something more like Skippy though better tasting. Just don't let your sandwich warm up or the peanut butter becomes runny again. More like peanut butter syrup.It'll get eaten but not reordered. Crazy Richard needs to start adding more peanuts to his oily peanut soup.
customer_reviews.author: Timotheus

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Really good peanut butter. Since it is all natural, it does separate and its really dry if you take a bite of it plain. But, It tastes great on bread and I have even made muffins with it and as long as you mi it well or blend it well, it works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: IDG

customer_reviews.title: butter and oil separated
customer_reviews.text: opened the container and the butter and oil was so badly separated that I was thinking it might have sat on the shelf for a while. I could live with this, I don't mind mixing it up, but the flavor was so bad it was pointless. I would rather just eat peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this on here
customer_reviews.text: This was unusable out of the can. Hard as a rock! It isnt like that from Kroger or Walmart. I have no idea why they are all like this from Amazon. Wont be buying them from here again. Ridiculous! I have to dump the peanut butter in a pan & heat it on the stove & stir it for a while to get it to melt to a spreadable consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I may of review this before but this is a great product I been using it for 3 years along with the peanut butter powder. Ok what I like is first no sugar and no sodium great if you watching that in your diet. It taste to me great. Some things you may not like is you do have to stir it each time as the oil does separate for me I don't mine but I know other may.
customer_reviews.author: William Seymore

customer_reviews.title: Great sugar and salt free peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this peanut butter for my dog since it's difficult to find it without any sugar or salt, and reasonably priced. What can I say, he loves it! I've tasted it myself, and it's delicious. A taste that must be acquired though, because we are so used to the added sugar and salt. Honestly, I don't miss it at all. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: DianaD

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of PB, and this one has become my favorite. It's delicate, refined, but very satisfying. It's all peanuts, nothing else. It spreads easily, not too stiff or salty. I've tried brands that use roasted peanuts that have a stronger flavor from the roasting. If you are used to that type, this will seem mild at first, more bland even. But after a few bites the beauty of this product shines through nicely!
customer_reviews.author: ken h

customer_reviews.title: Mine came with mold and one was open
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the two pack. Both came with mold on the outside bottom of the jars. One was open and the oil had messed up the two jars. There were safety seals but the one jar it was broken open. This is my favorite peanut butter but I will never order from amazon again. No more food items from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not creamy and to much oil at top. If you pour off oil, then it is to stiff and if you attempt to mix in oil, it is to thin and clumpy. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is the best tasting Peanut Butter IMHO.
customer_reviews.text: I use to eat another all natural brand, but they raised their prices, so I tried this brand. Glad I did as it tastes much better than the other brand, Don't know how that works as both only contain peanuts, but this one tastes better. It is kind of runny as their are no other ingredients to hold it together, but I don't want any junk in my PB and it tastes great. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RightReviewNow

customer_reviews.title: I love this peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this peanut butter twenty years ago and will never willingly purchase a different peanut butter again. The creamy peanut butter is truly creamy, not "gritty" like others. I mix the peanut butter with my Kitchenaid and put it in the fridge to prevent separation. The flavor is delicious and since the only ingredient is peanuts, it is not adulterated with sugar, salt, or saturated fat.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like when companies make healthy products - this is perfect. I needed low sodium, I dont want sugar & this is nice. And thank you for shipping in a custom box instead of a huge box with empty space. These people thought things through & I appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Kalen L

customer_reviews.title: Best peanut taste every time
customer_reviews.text: Good peanut butter, with no additives, takes some work to stir...Crazy Richard may be more fluid than some other brands, but it's really all about the taste...full, rich peanut taste, never "burned" Try drizzling on vanilla gelato...uummmm...even better with crunchy
customer_reviews.author: A Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kongs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this PB as a healthy alternative to put in my dog's Kong's. I am working form home and I have to keep him busy during conference calls. I LOVE this product because it is all natural. Plus it is a little on the loose side which is a benefit because I can just pour the PB into the Kong's with no mess. Then I freeze them. I just ordered 6 more jars. I also use it on my toast so it also tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I've Been Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried quite a few peanut butter brands. I have finally found what I have been searching; not too sweet nor too salty, like so many brands out there! The only issue is the price. That's why I am giving it 4 stars. $9 for ONE peanut butter jar of 16oz, is a little excessive in my opinion...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: Regular peanut butter is made with palm oil and sugar. Palm oil is a saturated fat (ie, bad fat). And who needs more sugar in their diet? This peanut butter is made with one thing, peanuts. Just add several packets of Splenda and it tastes just like regular peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: The best I've ever had...
customer_reviews.text: I've eaten PB regularly my entire life ( 60+ years ) and while natural PB's all taste quite similar, this one seems to have a slight edge: better taste. I add Himalayan pink salt to mine because it's far superior to regular table salt in so many ways and it's not just the taste. Table salt is bad for you, pink salt is healthy! I recommend this PB. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Keeper

customer_reviews.title: $10 for the SMALLEST jar. Thought it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: $10 for the SMALLEST jar. Thought it would be consistent with the other large PB's that are for sale on the site. Save your money and just go to the store and buy 3 of these size jars for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Collins

customer_reviews.title: Too Gooey for Kong toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it doesn't have added salt or sugar. For that I give it 2 stars. But it is a drippy, gooey mess -- impossible to fill my dogs kong toys. Maybe I should move it from my fridge to my freezer for awhile. Will have to look elsewhere, alas.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: The best for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dog to fill their Kong toys every day before I leave for work. It's pretty thin, so I fill them and freeze for a couple of hours. I like that the only ingredient is peanuts. My dogs are raw fed and I'm very conscious of any treat that I give them and I don't want them getting salt or palm oil or anything else unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: CH17

customer_reviews.title: Using it to bake home made doggie cookies for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Using it to bake home made doggie cookies for my older pup who loves peanut butter but I had to cut out salt due to health concerns. Store bought home made cookies/treats are expensive! My 14 year old pup loves my cookies!!🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVES This!
customer_reviews.text: My cute little Maltipoo can't get enough of this peanut butter. I heard of people giving peanut butter to their pets, but thankfully I did some quick research online. Bought the right peanut butter. Tasted it myself before giving him some :) its good stuff and natural too. At first its really watery, I keep it in the fridge and it becomes very thick. When I need some I just mix a little bit really fast and it gets to the right consistency. Just don't mess around with it too long, it gets watery again really quick when exposed to "heat" (outside the fridge).
customer_reviews.author: Haik D

customer_reviews.title: So so RUNNY!
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter tastes good and I love that the only ingredient is peanuts, but it is SO RUNNY! It’s more of a liquid than a spread. It drips right out of my kids’ sandwiches and makes a huge mess every single time. I had to mark stars off because i would not call this peanut butter, but rather peanut sauce. It does make it easy to drizzle though I guess🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Thick!
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter is very thick to stir at first to get all the oil from peanuts mixed in and when you get to the bottom of the jar, it seems much thinner. More liquid than peanuts. But at least it claims 100% peanuts with no additives!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Who needs 12 jars of peanut butter?
customer_reviews.text: It turns out that I do! This stuff is a little runny, otherwise I would have given it five stars. This peanut butter tastes fresh, comes in safe, shatter-proof jars and will last me through the pandemic. I feel better already.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog school uses this peanut butter in class. We bought it because it has a great liquified consistency when you stir it really well from first opening. It is amazing for dog licky mats or a Kong when you want to easily make a quick SES device for your pup!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Great, all natural peanut taste!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! All natural peanut taste. I was surprised how little stirring it needed compared to other all natural brands I've bought in the past. Note: If you've never tried a true all-natural peanut butter, (and some national brands label theirs as all-natural but still add sugars and oils) it is not sweet like most other peanut butters. Just the great taste of nothing but peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious AND healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Good peanut butter without lots of added sugar. I have to admit that I sometimes just eat it out of the jar. On special occasions, I throw some chocolate chips in with the peanut butter.......mmmmmmmm :O)
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Best one so far.
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several brands of peanut butter on amazon given that the ones we liked either run out of stock or can't be delivered. This is the newest and seems to have the best flavor. Easy to spread. Pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Good peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes with peanut/cashew/etc spreads I have a bit of an allergic reaction to them (possibly mold or other contaminants?) but that was not experienced with this peanut butter. Good flavor and mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: John Littrel

customer_reviews.title: Not One Complaint! Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter is crazy good! It is smooth, creamy, spreadable and delicious. Whatever kind of peanuts they use are the perfect flavor. It is addicting! The jar size, 16oz, is pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsyLady

customer_reviews.title: Who jacked the price up?
customer_reviews.text: Delicious all natural peanut butter. All I ever buy, except now because of the price incresase of ten dollars. I love this peanut butter with the no additives what so ever! Will buy again, just not now.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my puppy but I love it too! Natural and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: This came fast and tastes great. Just peanuts! No added salt, sugar or junk! It's a little more starchy/sticky (but way less oily) than your typically Skippy but I love it and it's great for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Lee

customer_reviews.title: Just ok!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this peanut butter only contains peanuts and no artificial ingredient, but the fact that it has no salt it tastes very bland and when I use it in my smoothie it does not have much flavor!
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: This is really good creamy peanut butter. We usually buy Trader Joe’s or Knudsens but couldn’t find any peanut butter at the store during the mad rush for food. We go through a lot of peanut butter so we ordered this bulk. I’m glad I bought this kind and will definitely buy it again as it seems better than the kind we get at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hribar

customer_reviews.title: The entire order was not received
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom and she loves it, this could be her favorite. She can’t leave the house right now and she was excited to have “gourmet” peanut butter. She felt a little inconvenienced due to the shipping error. Ultimately she received the rest of her shipment. Sad to say right now she cant get a lot of food due to the situation around the world, so it’s good that companies are still producing stuff people love. Especially to get through this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste is fine, great for cooking.fresh tasting
customer_reviews.text: No preservatives and make great cookies or sauces. Very liquid at room temp, just pours so I keep one in the fridge to have some for on bread. I wrote the exact same description of a similar product - I would only choose between them on price.
customer_reviews.author: Beth and John

customer_reviews.title: My order was way too runny - you can literally pour it out like maple syrup.
customer_reviews.text: My order, which was HUGE, was nasty, it was runny ... so runny you could pour it on bread. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: The Yeti

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: natural, only peanuts in this peanut butter-it has palm oil floating on top and I pour that out, so what is left is only the peanuts with enough oil left to make it smooth-I buy this all the time.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Love this peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: I love this peanut butter and bought it frequently (at about the same price) at Publix. Now, they are consistently out of it. I bought a product to stir it with and store it upside down in the refrigerator. Best peanut butter ever! Ingredients: Peanuts. That’s the absolute best part!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre W

customer_reviews.title: So oily
customer_reviews.text: I am used to peanut butter with no added salt or sugar, so was expecting to be happy with this. But they put so much oil in this stuff just tastes of nothing. 365 brand is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very, very pleased with this peanut butter. We are so thrilled to find a product that is ONLY peanuts, and not sharing a facility with tree nuts as our grandson is allergic to tree nuts. Sooooo many peanut butter products are out for us, so it was delightful to find Crazy Richard's!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen O'Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: My dog gives it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this just for my dog. My fiancé left a brand new jar on the counter and my dog boy ate the whole thing. Once I was done laugh/crying, I wasn’t worried because the only ingredients are peanuts. I guess he also really likes the taste. 5 stars from the both of us.
customer_reviews.author: KBitters

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Very separated and separates again quickly after stirring. It was difficult to spread as it got thick quickly as it separated. And I wasn’t really a fan of the flavor either.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: All natural peanut butter at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: Great, all natural, no frills peanut butter. Since the ingredients are simple, the peanut butter is very liquidy and easy to spread and put in smoothies. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Does not taste good at all. We just couldn’t fool ourselves with this one. It didn’t taste good. It does spread on the bread nicely.
customer_reviews.author: SheLovesThePages

customer_reviews.title: Risky buying this product. Bad batch and not returnable (and cannot receive a refund)
customer_reviews.text: Normally good, but this latest batch is so hard that it cannot be stirred or spread on bread. And I apparently cannot receive a refund for this bad batch. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: ANL

customer_reviews.title: Best peanut butter there is.
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite peanut butter, love that the only ingredient is peanuts and there's no salt. Our store no longer carries Richards peanut butter, was very happy to find it on Amazon. I ordered my husband a case as a birthday gift haha
customer_reviews.author: A. Hoxie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious peanut butter! We love the taste, the ingredients list, and the fact that it is very runny and easy to spread. This is our new go-to peanut butter brand!
customer_reviews.author: NA Costa

customer_reviews.title: Water, with a dash of peanut
customer_reviews.text: No need to grab a butter knife to spread this “peanut butter” on your toast because this $10 jar is 99% water 1% peanut so get ready to just pour this mystery fluid all over your sandwich. Or just sip it out of the jar! I never thought peanut butter could ever disappoint, but congrats- this did it! Now I know why Richard is crazy because this was the most depressingly watery peanut butter I’ve ever experienced. Thanks guys! Now I’m crazy too
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail R.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT order. It is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product!!! The consistency is like a thin gravy. Even after stirring it, it literally can be poured out of the jar. And the taste is terrible! Unlike any peanut butter I’ve ever had. My granddaughters usually eat peanut butter by the spoonful but they will NOT eat this! Plus it wouldn’t stay in a spoon if they tried. Seriously, I am debating on if I can even donate it to a food bank— it is that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Keto diet
customer_reviews.text: If you are a keto diet person this is for you. My husband adds one habanero almond to each for flavor because it doesn’t taste like your typical peanut butter
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: too runny
customer_reviews.text: Good value, but the product is more like a peanut butter sauce rather then spreadable peanut butter. Flavor is good and it has less sugar then many brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: EmMP.

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT 1 ingredient item, with NO SALT I love those type.
customer_reviews.text: A great peanut butter!! This is a 1 ingredient item, I love those type. They could pour out some of the extra oil out that before packing though. But just the fact that it is NO salt is GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: arby

customer_reviews.title: This is runny
customer_reviews.text: This is not thick like normal peanut butter. It is so runny you cannot make a sandwich. Half of the peanut butter runs off of the bread.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! And of course sodium-free
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who's on a sodium/potassium free diet. He absolutely loves it, says the flavor and texture are great. The only "con" is that unless refrigerated it separates and has to be stirred.
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, pure peanuts
customer_reviews.text: I eat a ton of this stuff by the spoonful. Tastes great and much healthier than chips or pretzels and kills my munchies. And the only ingredient is PEANUTS. No sugar, salt or other stuff you don't need. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: McDaniken

customer_reviews.title: Great peanut flavor, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: After all these years - first time, 3-pack shipped within one hour of when I ordered! Really like arriving so soon as I was running low. Will order again. Thanks :-)
customer_reviews.author: Joe Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have bought sugar and salt free Peantbutter in the past and this brand seems to be runny even when refrigerated. The taste is somewhat bland.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far the BEST Sodium/Salt Free Peanut Butter ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried them all! This is the best!!!! It needs a really good stirring when you first open, refrigerate and enjoy! Crazy Richard's is a CRAZY name for this yummy stuff, it is the absolute best though if you are on a salt free, sugar free diet! I bought a case!!! :) Please don't stop making this wonderful treat!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Yummy peanut butter freshest I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Very peanutty not sure that’s a word. Very tasty and fresh . Much better then store bought stuff! Now on 2nd jar...Love this PB
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yummy..it gets firm for spreading if kept refrigerated. Delicious stuff!!! Best thing, it's delicious with no salt!!!
customer_reviews.author: J3 user

customer_reviews.title: RUNNY!  Even when refrigerated!!
customer_reviews.text: By definition it is not butter! It is so runny that one can never spread it; it runs all over not only on the toast but on the whole plate and your fingers too!
customer_reviews.author: one recent customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you know that palm oil poisons dogs???  Use this, instead!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs are poisoned by palm oil!!! Many of the healthier peanut butters contain a mother lode of palm oil. Keep your dogs safe, and be patient enough to stir your pb!! People love it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Snowy Owl

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: The yummiest peanut butter—and no added sugar!! Also, awesome customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Team Healthy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I use this peanut butter for several different treats that I make for my dogs. It has nothing added to it - just peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: arava pet wipes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It's far too runny for my family, but I mainly got it because it's 100% peanuts and I trust it for my puppy. Dog approved
customer_reviews.author: BizarreCarnival

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: I love this peanut butter! Tastes great, is easy to spread, and is pure peanut butter with nothing else added. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are on a low sodium diet ,it spreads easy just mix the oil up . If you want it thick put in refrigerator!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Funk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, easy to mix and spread, only peanuts, delicious! The jars are small, but that’s clearly stated. The crunchy variation is also delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Something isn’t right.
customer_reviews.text: Somethings not right. Peanut butter is extremely liquidy. Could have to do with heat in UPS truck but doesn’t taste right and I’m afraid plastics have leaked into product.
customer_reviews.author: P Dazzle

customer_reviews.title: delicious !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my daughter and I could make our low carb peanut butter cups. we found it tasted awesome and worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: derl

product_meta.title: Crazy Richard’s Creamy Peanut Butter, 100% Natural, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, 16 Ounce Jars (Pack of 6)
feature_bullets: 6-Pack of Crazy Richard’s 100% Natural Creamy Peanut Butter 16oz Jars
Our peanut butter is made with the highest-quality peanuts, grown right here in the United States
The peanuts taste delicious just as they are, with no added sugar, salt, fat or filler
